A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was the new Star Wars movie I hoped for: A movie that introduced many original ideas while delivering the action\, tone and characters we know.

Is it perfect? No way. No movie is\, although Episode V of Star Wars comes close. I felt this movie was a bit too long\, some sub-plots could have been taken out or cut shorter.

But the main plot about Kylo\, Luke and Rey is really great. It really gets you invested in the movie and the turns it took never stopped to surprise me. I loved it when they killed Snoke - this was a wonderful moment that invalidated all those stupid fan theories. Snoke was just a plot device and not the Emperor 2.0 - great. This story isn´t about him\, its about Kylo\, he is our villain.

The humor in the movie was more pronounced compared with other Star Wars movie\, but I prefer that over an almost humorless movie like Rogue One. I did not mind it.
